scripts.publish-patch: git stash && npm version patch && git stash pop && git commit -am 'chore(release): publish new version' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: git stash && npm version minor && git stash pop && git commit -am 'chore(release): publish new version' && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: git stash && npm version major && git stash pop && git commit -am 'chore(release): publish new version' && git push && npm publish
